item.title: Entangel? ice barrage dont freeze? help plz
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

add these voids if you dont have them

public void entangle()
{
EntangleDelay = 20;
}
public void uberentangle()
{
EntangleDelay = 40;
}

in case 98 add this

if (EntangleDelay >= 1) {
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
sendMessage("A magical force stops you from moving!");
}

add this int if you dont have them

        public int EntangleDelay = 0;

and finally add this in boolean process

        if(EntangleDelay > 0)
        EntangleDelay -= 1;

note if you have any of these already in your server, then obviously donâ€™t add it

Read full topic
